root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 9-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: This indicator corresponds to the global sustainable development target 9.5.1: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP
Chỉ tiêu này tương ứng chỉ tiêu phát triển bền vững toàn cầu 9.5.1: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP
